sentences.english: We should check evidence (such as despatched records and correspondence) that the goods have been returned.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该审核货物是否被退回的证据。

sentences.english: Recently, also identified specific procedures and the purchase of "three table" vetting .
sentences.chinese: 近日，又确定了具体的购买程序和“三表”审核办法。

sentences.english: Both line managers and employees have the responsibility to promote a half-year review.
sentences.chinese: 直线经理和员工都有责任推动年中审核。

sentences.english: TCCC must have the right to verify the copy with the inspecting company.
sentences.chinese: TCCC公司有权与审核机构进行核实报告的真实性。

sentences.english: Departments involved are responsible for reviewing and implementing this SOP.
sentences.chinese: 相关部门负责本规程的审核与执行。

sentences.english: Do not send a copy of the review to the application that references the DMF.
sentences.chinese: 不要向引用DMF的申请方发送一份审核文件。

sentences.english: It is important that TCCC's requirements are showed with any audit firm used.
sentences.chinese: 关键是不同的审核公司都将TCCC的要求反映出来。

sentences.english: For the increase of employees and equipment, the production dispatch department.
sentences.chinese: 关于设备人手，生产调度部做个计划交给财务部审核。

sentences.english: The Municipal Department of human resources protection shall complete the examination within 10 working days.
sentences.chinese: 市人力资源保障部门应当在10个工作日内完成审核。

sentences.english: All department heads to review the Brand Standards Audit form for their respective area.
sentences.chinese: 所有部门的领导为各自的区域复习品牌标准审核表。

sentences.english: Qi Jessie will support me during this audit.
sentences.chinese: 补气杰西将在审核过程中支持我。

sentences.english: The functional departments are responsible to coordinate the audit team and follow its assignment.
sentences.chinese: 各职能部门负责配合审核小组开展工作，服从其安排。

sentences.english: At last, I also examined and verified some biological teaching materials about the 7th Grade.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我还审核了七年级生物的一些教学资料。

sentences.english: The checklists used for these audits must be approved by SGS.
sentences.chinese: 用于这些审核的检查表必须由SGS批准。

sentences.english: All A suppliers with new factories must be FCCA audited.
sentences.chinese: 所有有新工厂的A类供应商都应该进行FCCA审核。

definition: editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
(publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
